p: The title compound was prepared by the mCPBA oxidation of 3-{4-[4-Chloro-2-(6-methyl-pyridine-3-carbonyl)-phenylsulfamoyl]-phenyl}-propionic acid methyl ester according to the general procedure. 1H-NMR (CDCl3) δ 9.47(br s, 1H, NH), 8.26 (m, 1H), 7.69 (d, 1 H, J = 8.8 Hz), 7.59 (dm, 2H, J = 8.4 Hz), 7.53 (dd, 1 H, J = 8.8 Hz, J = 2.6 Hz), 7.48 (m, 2H), 7.35 (d, 1 H, J = 2.6 Hz), 7.18 (dm, 2H, J = 8.4 Hz), 3.64 (s, 3H), 2.88(t, 2H, J = 7.6 Hz), 2.67 (s, 3H), 2.51 (t, 2H, J = 7.6 Hz). MS: m/z 489 (M +1).
